neighbors.name: Blue Star Dairy Farms
neighbors.claims: Blue Star Dairy Farms is a large family partnership operating across two sites in DeForest and Arlington, milking approximately 2,100 to 2,400 cows [Mid-West Farm Report](https://www.midwestfarmreport.com/2024/05/14/blue-star-dairy-farms-is-your-host/) [DCRC](https://www.dcrcouncil.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/2025-DCRC-tour-Blue-Star-Dairy-Farms-002.pdf). The farm has been in the Meinholz family since 1946 and is currently operated by third-generation brothers Craig and Brian Meinholz, along with partner Jim Hahn [Dairy Star](https://dairystar.com/stories/focused-on-results,20212). Farm co-owner and manager Sherri Meinholz serves as Supervisor #2 on the Vienna Town Board [Town of Vienna](https://viennawi.gov/town-board/). The farm participates in renewable energy initiatives by supplying manure to the Springfield biodigester [Town of Springfield](https://www.town.springfield.wi.us/wp-content/uploads/Comp-Plan-Amended-6.6.23_w-maps-and-appendices-2.pdf). However, Sherri Meinholz has previously expressed concern that utility-scale solar developers drive up farmland rental rates, making it difficult for dairy farmers to compete for the land base needed to support their herds [Madison Commons](https://madisoncommons.org/massive-solar-project-could-change-the-landscape-in-rural-dane-county/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Town Supervisor (Sherri Meinholz); large local employer

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via formal channels given Sherri Meinholz's board role. Acknowledge the farm's participation in biogas but address specific concerns about solar land competition. Frame the project as compatible with, rather than a threat to, the local agricultural land base.

neighbors.name: Cynthia M. LaValley
neighbors.claims: Cynthia M. LaValley is a local landowner in the Town of Vienna who co-owns multiple agricultural parcels with Gerald R. Hahn [Town of Vienna Assessment](https://www.apraz.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/T.-Vienna-2024-Completed-Real-Estate-Assessment-Roll-1.pdf) [DeForest Zoning Map](https://hdp-us-prod-app-deforest-engage-files.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/3217/6797/2380/4_Proposed_Zoning_Map_2025.12.05.pdf). She does not hold public office and has no documented stance on development issues [Town of Vienna](https://viennawi.gov/town-board/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Connect through a personal approach. Given her co-ownership with Gerald Hahn, utilize any existing relationships with the Hahn family (who are partners in Blue Star Dairy). Emphasize respect for property legacy.

citations.claim: Co-owns multiple agricultural parcels with Gerald R. Hahn
citations.title: Town of Vienna 2024 Completed Real Estate Assessment Roll

citations.claim: Property ownership verified in zoning records
citations.title: DeForest Proposed Zoning Map
